question.title: Will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

Q.title: Will Iran conduct a significant cyber attack against Israel before May 1, 2024?
Q.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran has successfully disrupted critical infrastructure in Israel, regardless of casualties.

P_given_Q.title: Given Iran conducts a significant cyber attack against Israel, will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
P_given_Q.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals. The condition for the first part is that credible reports indicate an attack attributed to Iran has successfully disrupted critical infrastructure in Israel, regardless of casualties.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given Iran does not conduct a significant cyber attack against Israel before May 1, 2024, will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
P_given_not_Q.body:
This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

Condition for P: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that an attack attributed to Iran has successfully disrupted critical infrastructure in Israel, regardless of casualties.

Q.title: Will Iran be involved in a military conflict with Israel before the end of 2024?
Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before December 31, 2024, credible reports indicate that Iran has engaged in direct military hostilities against Israel that result in casualties.

P_given_Q.title: Given Iran's involvement in a military conflict with Israel, will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel?
P_given_Q.body: This question will resolve as Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals. The condition for this question is that credible reports must indicate that Iran has engaged in direct military hostilities against Israel that result in casualties before December 31, 2024.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given that Iran will not be involved in a military conflict with Israel before the end of 2024, will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
P_given_not_Q.body:
This question will resolve as Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals. 

Condition for P: This question will resolve as Yes if, following the date of this question's publication and before December 31, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that Iran has engaged in direct military hostilities against Israel that result in casualties.

question.title: Is it expected that Iran will execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024?
question.body: This question will be answered with a **Yes** if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people.

Q.title: Will Iran support a significant military operation against Israel by the end of 2024?
Q.body: This question will be answered with a Yes if, after the publication date of this question and before December 31, 2024, there are credible reports of Iran providing military support to a group conducting operations against Israel that results in significant military engagement.

P_given_Q.title: Given Iran's support for a significant military operation against Israel, will Iran execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024?
P_given_Q.body: This question will be answered with a Yes if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people, given that there are credible reports of Iran providing military support to a group conducting operations against Israel that results in significant military engagement before December 31, 2024.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given Iran does not support a significant military operation against Israel by the end of 2024, will Iran execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024?
P_given_not_Q.body: This question will be answered with a Yes if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people. The condition for this question is: this question will be answered with a Yes if, after the publication date of this question and before December 31, 2024, there are no credible reports of Iran providing military support to a group conducting operations against Israel that results in significant military engagement.

Q.title: Will Iran support a major military operation against Israel by the end of 2024?
Q.body: This question will be answered with a Yes if, after the publication date of this question and before December 31, 2024, there are credible reports of Iran providing significant military support for an operation against Israel, regardless of the outcome of that operation.

P_given_Q.title: Given Iran supports a major military operation against Israel, will Iran execute a lethal assault inside Israel?
P_given_Q.body: This question will be answered with a Yes if, after the publication date of the first question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people. The first question will be answered with a Yes if, after the publication date of that question and before December 31, 2024, there are credible reports of Iran providing significant military support for an operation against Israel, regardless of the outcome of that operation.

P_given_not_Q.title: Given that Iran will not support a major military operation against Israel by the end of 2024, will Iran execute a lethal assault inside Israel by May 1, 2024?
P_given_not_Q.body:
This question will be answered with a Yes if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports of an attack linked to Iran that takes place within Israel's borders and results in the death of at least five people. 

Condition: This question will be answered with a Yes if, after the publication date of this question and before December 31, 2024, there are no credible reports of Iran providing significant military support for an operation against Israel.
